name: HEN BELLS
description:
We have been affected by the epidemic for almost 2 years. So many were affected and tried various ways to survive. The existence of NFT is very helpful for those of us who are surviving in the creative industry. These bells represent the bonsho or tsurigane commonly found at temples throughout Japan for prayer and marking time periods. And wooden buildings made without using nails. There is always hope in every prayer and there is always a way to connect with each other without depending on anything.

2048x2048px | 2021 | .gif
